UK government to ban disposable vapes to prevent use by childrenBritish Prime Minister Rishi Sunak will announce plans on Monday to ban the sale of disposable vapes to prevent their use by children, and reiterate the government's intention to introduce a law preventing younger generations from buying tobacco. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 22:51:03 GMT WWBK2SSPNBJ7HAO4IMS7WFPW7A https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uk-government-ban-disposable-vapes-prevent-use-by-children-2024-01-28/Reuters世界英国
Ukraine's Zelenskiy publishes income as part of transparency driveUkrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy made public his income over a two-year period on Sunday as part of a drive to promote transparency and root out endemic corruption. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 21:55:53 GMT M6PWGYZHNFLP5KSUDH5U6E2AEM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-zelenskiy-publishes-venue-part-transparency-drive-2024-01-28/Reuters世界欧洲
Iran-backed attacks on US troops in the Middle East since Oct. 7The unmanned aerial drone attack that killed three U.S. service members and wounded dozens in northeastern Jordan on Sunday is the latest by Iran-aligned militia groups in Iraq and Syria. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 21:39:10 GMT EOBF5QYXFNLZ7BMLDK5XAE7GLE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iran-backed-attacks-us-troops-middle-east-since-oct-7-2024-01-28/Reuters世界中东
North Korea tests submarine-launched cruise missiles, KCNA saysNorth Korea tested its new strategic cruise missiles for the second time in a week on Sunday, calling it a newly developed submarine-launched cruise missile (SLCM), accelerating its navy's nuclear armament, state media reported on Monday. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 21:28:33 GMT IEZB3WJWG5OZLDHQN7MUYVL4FM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-tests-submarine-launched-cruise-missile-kcna-says-2024-01-28/Jack Kim世界亚太地区
Seeking Western support, Zelenskiy voices world war riskPresident Volodymyr Zelenskiy voiced the danger of the Ukraine conflict escalating into World War Three, as he pressed his case for support from nations from Germany to the United States in an interview with German state broadcaster ARD on Sunday. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 21:04:57 GMT SUHJ4QFDIBLBDBU6QUZQR7CHV4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/seeking-western-support-zelenskiy-voices-world-war-risk-2024-01-28/Reuters世界欧洲
Jordan condemns 'terrorist attack' on post at Syria borderJordan condemned on Sunday the "terrorist attack" on a military advance post just inside its border with Syria that killed three U.S. military members and injured dozens. Israeli settlers hold conference on resettlement in GazaHundreds of members of the Israeli settler community gathered for a convention in Jerusalem on Sunday calling for Israel to rebuild settlements in Gaza and the northern part of the Occupied West Bank. What is Tower 22, site of the attack on US troops in Jordan?Three U.S. troops were killed and dozens wounded after a drone hit a military outpost in Jordan known as Tower 22. Russian missile hits Ukraine's Kremenchuk district for second day, no casualtiesA Russian missile hit an industrial site in the central Ukrainian district of Kremenchuk on Sunday for a second straight day, the regional governor said, adding the strike had caused no casualties. Hostage-deal gaps remain, Israeli prime minister's office saysTalks held on Sunday initiated by Qatar, the United States and Egypt to broker a hostage deal between Israel and Hamas were "constructive" but meaningful gaps remain, the Israeli prime minister's office said. Moldovan negotiator rules out Moscow role in solving separatist issueMoldova's top negotiator in resolving the three-decade-old dispute with its pro-Russian Transdniestria separatist enclave on Sunday ruled out any role for Russia in finding a solution as long as it was engaged in its war in Ukraine.
